scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty
scripts.test: npm run build && ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js test/unit/**/*.spec.ts test/unit/*.spec.ts src/**/*.ts
scripts.test:coverage: ts-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -e .ts  -x "*.d.ts" -x "*.spec.ts" _mocha -- --compilers ts:ts-node/register -R spec test/unit/**/*.spec.ts test/unit/*.spec.ts
scripts.watch:test: ./node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js -e .ts -w src -w test/unit -w test/fixture --exec 'ts-node' node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js test/unit/**/*.spec.ts test/unit/*.spec.ts src/**/*.ts
